name: AFGBuildableRailroadStation
comment: Base class for rail road stations. Not to be confused railroad docking stations.

methods.name: GetStationIdentifier
methods.comment: Get the station identifier for this station. Shared between server, client and used in time tables.

methods.name: OnNameChanged
methods.comment: Called when the name of the station has changed.

methods.name: GetStationOutputConnection
methods.comment: Returns the component specified as an output (pointing away from the station to its children)

methods.name: CanDock
methods.comment: @return true if the given locomotive is valid for docking.

methods.name: StartDocking
methods.comment: @return true if we docked; false if we did not, e.g. no freight cars to dock.

methods.name: NotifyPlatformDockingComplete
methods.comment: Called by other platforms after a docking procedure to notify of their status

methods.name: GetDockedVehicleOffset
methods.comment: Called by relevant docked platforms to get offset to use for position the arm claw

methods.name: DockVehiclesToPlatforms
methods.comment: Tries to dock each vehicle in the train to a platform

methods.name: FinishDockingSequence
methods.comment: Called when a docking sequence is complete to undock the locomotive and finalize the dock

properties.name: mStationIdentifier
properties.comment:
@todotrains private
Light weight representation about this station, the railroad subsystem is responsible for this.

properties.name: mDockedPlatformList
properties.comment: When docked, this station will fill this array with every potential platform in its tail. 1 for each train segment

properties.name: mDockedPositionOffset
properties.comment: Stores the distance from the perfect center of the platform that a docked loco has stopped. Used to position the claw arm when loading/unloading.
